edge: Schmidt witnesses Lehnsherr bending a metal gate with his mind upon being separated from his parents at the Auschwitz concentration camp. Schmidt brings Lehnsherr into his office and asks him to move a coin on his desk, which Lehnsherr cannot do. In response, Schmidt kills Lehnsherr's mother.
Lehnsherr's magnetic power manifests and destroys the room after Schmidt kills his mother due to Lehnsherr's inability to move a coin on his desk.
